input.sentences: my parents showed me some old photos of them last week .
they had to look through their entire office to find them .
when the power went out they has to use candles .
when we found them we decided to upload them online .
i had a great time with them .
output.sentences: We found a old picture of my parents.
The picture had been buried in my fathers office.
We lit a candle for all those who had passed before us.
We did an internet search on our family history.
Some of our estranged family decided to join us tonight for the vigil.
